Package com.justinkleiber.motor.controllers

Package for controlling the game and hardware

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TouchHandler
    Interface that defines Touch input
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileManager
    Manages File I/O
    MotorAudio
    Manages Audio
    MotorBackdrop
    Implements the defined Backdrop Functions
    MotorClock
    Manages all timekeeping in Motor
    MotorCollision
    Determines if Sprites and SpriteSheets are colliding or are in a certain position
    MotorGraphics
    Manages the drawing of all graphics to a canvas
    MotorInput
    Manages both the Multi-Touch and Single Touch features of Motor
    MotorMultiTouch
    Handles all Multi-Touch Input
    MotorMusic
    Plays all Music
    MotorOneTouch
    Manages Single Touch Input
    MotorSFX
    Handles and plays the Sound Effects
    MotorSprite
    The Sprite Object, an Image and all of its properties
    MotorSpriteSheet
    Contains the properties of a Sprite Sheet
    MotorUI
    Determines how the User Interface is used
    MotorVibrate
    Controls Phone vibration

Package com.justinkleiber.motor.controllers Description
